# isNotUndefined() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/nullables](./esdmr.assert.nullables.md) &gt; [isNotUndefined](./esdmr.assert.nullables.isnotundefined.md)


Asserts that the given value is not `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNotUndefined<T>(value: T | undefined, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): asserts value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T \| undefined | Value to assert. |
|  detail | string | Extra description. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts value is T
